ModName.Chinese: BT 商品更高的存储量 (Serp)

Description.Chinese: 中立贸易者存储量从150t提升至300t。AI玩家购买量从50吨增加到200吨
Description.English: Increases the max storage amount of goods of AI merchants from 150t to 300t. Increases the max passive buying amount from AI players from 50t to 200t.
Description.French: Increases the max storage amount of goods of AI merchants from 150t to 300t. Increases the max passive buying amount from AI players from 50t to 200t.
Description.German: Erhöht die maximale Lagerkapazität für Waren bei den KI Händlern von 150t auf 300t. Erhöht die maximale Menge an Waren die KI Mitspieler an ihrem Kontor ankaufen von 50t auf 200t.
Description.Italian: Increases the max storage amount of goods of AI merchants from 150t to 300t. Increases the max passive buying amount from AI players from 50t to 200t.
Description.Korean: Increases the max storage amount of goods of AI merchants from 150t to 300t. Increases the max passive buying amount from AI players from 50t to 200t.
Description.Polish: Increases the max storage amount of goods of AI merchants from 150t to 300t. Increases the max passive buying amount from AI players from 50t to 200t.

Description.Spanish: Increases the max storage amount of goods of AI merchants from 150t to 300t. Increases the max passive buying amount from AI players from 50t to 200t.
Description.Taiwanese: Increases the max storage amount of goods of AI merchants from 150t to 300t. Increases the max passive buying amount from AI players from 50t to 200t.
